mapper.update: update seckill set seckill_name = #{seckillName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_count = #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, finish_time = #{finishTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where seckill_id = #{seckillId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select seckill_id, seckill_name, stock_count, state, create_time, start_time, finish_time from seckill
